sections.heading: claim, defined.Third-party claim shall mean a final judgment against a responsible person obtained by a third party for compensation for bodily injury and property damage caused by a release first reported after January 1, 1990

sections.text:
66-1515.01.Third-party claim, defined.

Third-party claim shall mean a final judgment against a responsible person obtained by a third party for compensation for bodily injury and property damage caused by a release first reported after January 1, 1990.

SourceLaws 1991, LB 409, ยง 8.
